comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mordecai Peter Centennial "Three-Finger" Brown, carefully posed to obscure the part of his right hand which was mangled in farm machinery in his youth. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mordecai_Brown

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "That old paw served me pretty well in its time. It gave me a firmer grip on the ball so I could spin it over the hump. It gave me a greater dip." - Mordecai 'Three Finger' Brown Here is Brown's page at the Baseball Hall Of Fame: baseballhall.org/hof/brown-mordecai
